comments.body:
why can't we introduce a argument with field as: `tcp_destination_eq` instead of `service_cfg`, where user can give input as `8080/www` and it'll be easier for user as well.
```suggestion
    tcp_destination_eq: 8080
```

@justjais  For service object there are many combinations, not always is tcp/destiantion/eq combination, so it would mean to have a key in the module that change every time. Also, and probably,more relevant, in some cases port is not required. 
For example:

```
object-group service ansible_test
 service-object tcp source range 0 65535
 service-object udp destination eq domain
 service-object tcp destination lt 1024
 service-object eigrp
 service-object tcp-udp source neq www
 service-object pim
 service-object ip
```
@FedericoOlivieri OK, you can pass on the service-object as `list` as done earlier.
